dodgey ball (prototype)

the first incarnation of my dodgeball game

what's this?

My intention was to make a fun fast-paced multiplayer game, akin to Sports Heads and games of that ilk. Except it's based on dodgeball rules, and played in 3D space.

Designed for controllers.

It got as far as it did, then life happened. I hope to revitalise the idea with dodgeball.
